name: White Chicken Chili
directions: Cut chicken into small chuncks place on bottom of slowcooker
Cut onion and put on top
Pour chicken broth, corn, beans, cream of chicken soup, and mix in crockpot
Cook on high 4hrs or low 6-8hrs
Half hour before serving add sour cream and cheese

name: Protien Balls
directions: Mix together
Form into balls
Place in fridge

name: Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 2 c elbow noodles cooked and drained
ritz crackers or panko bread crumbs
directions: Prehead oven to 350 degrees F
Mix everything together besides the ritx/panko
Spread into 9x13 pan
Top with ritz or panko
Bake until cheese has melted or top is golden brown, 30 minutes

name: Banana Chocolate Chip Pancakes
directions: Wisk flour, brown sugar, baking powder, sakt, and cinnamon in a large bowl
Whisk milk, egg, oil, and vanilla in a large measuring cup. Add wet ingredents to dry, add banana, and stir until combined. Stir in chocolate chips.

name: Southwest Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 1 can black beans drained and rinsed
directions: In large saucepan brown meat over medium heat until cooked. Drain excess grease. Add taco seasoning
Add tomatoes, onion, garlic, corn, and beans to meat and mix until well combined. Simmer 10-15 mins on low.
Prehead oven to 250 degress and prepare peppers.
Cut peppers in half lengthwise; remove seeds and membrane. Place cut side up in pan.
Fill each pepper with meat mixture, add cheese on top.
Optional to add water to bottom of pan to help pepper cook faster.
Bake at 350 for 50-60 mins until peppers are tender.

name: Bloody Mary
directions: Mix together
